document_data.name: Orbrekh
document_data.mainbody: '''The Orbrekh''' was a slim branch of the [[Orsraun Mountains]] in [[Turmish]].{{Cite web/More of the Vilhon Reach}}
document_data.Inhabitants: The Orbrekh was inhabited by a [[mountain giant]] clan called the "[[community of the high brows]]". Their relative peacefulness made the Orbrekh the safest part of the Orsrauns for travelers.
